name: banderitax and the magic tamisa version android alpha
name_original: banderitax and the magic tamisa version android alpha
description:
banderitax and the magic tamisa version android alpha is an adventure, RPG and platformer game developed by tunisiangamesstudios123. It was originally released in 2021.
banderitax and the magic tamisa version android alpha is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
